page.title: 13Parents Hobbies 3.
page.content: My dad's hobby is collecting beer cloths and beer glasses.He keeps the beer cloths all over his bedroom wall and the glasses he keeps in the living room cabinet.He likes to collect these things because one Christmas someone gave him a beer glass as a present and he has been collecting them ever since. He started to collect the beer cloths because he thought his bedroom looked bare,so he wanted something colourful to put on them.His first cloth came from a bar at the club of Towcester Town football supporters club,there he saw the barman putting the glasses on a very interesting beer cloth and persuaded him to let him have one. After this his collection has grown so that all four bedroom walls are covered now.They are often given him as presents.
